paper_names: Enhanced skeleton visualization for view invariant human action recognition
authors: Liu; Mengyuan and Liu; Hong and Chen; Chen
brief: 该工作是采用CNN的方式对多视角的骨骼点动作识别问题进行建模，作者用某种可视化的手段将不同视角的骨骼点序列可视化到二维图上，然后用一些图像增强的方式减小噪声，最后用CNN进行特征提取并且分类。

paper_names: Skeleton-Based Action Recognition With Shift Graph Convolutional Network
authors: Cheng; Ke and Zhang; Yifan and He; Xiangyu and Chen; Weihan and Cheng; Jian and Lu; Hanqing
publisher: Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
brief: 该文章启发自Shift卷积算子，是该算子在Graph领域的延生，用更少的参数量和计算量实现了更好的性能，此外该网络不需要任何空间卷积，通过shift操作就可以实现空间感受野。

paper_names: Spatial Temporal Graph Convolutional Networks for Skeleton-Based Action Recognition
authors: Sijie Yan and Yuanjun Xiong and Dahua Lin
brief: 该文章是骨骼点动作识别的经典之作，率先在骨骼点序列上采用了图卷积计算，达到了SOTA；同时提供了有效的开源框架，是很多后续工作的始祖。

paper_names: Bag of Tricks for Image Classification with Convolutional Neural Networks
authors: He; Tong and Zhang; Zhi and Zhang; Hang and Zhang; Zhongyue and Xie; Junyuan and Li; Mu
publisher: Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
brief: 该文章介绍了很多在图像分类领域的常用trick，具有很强的实践意义。

paper_names: Ernie-vil: Knowledge enhanced vision-language representations through scene graph
authors: Yu; Fei and Tang; Jiji and Yin; Weichong and Sun; Yu and Tian; Hao and Wu; Hua and Wang; Haifeng
brief: 该文章是由百度ERNIE改进而来，是一种结合文本-图片的多模态语义模型，其图片输入需要对图片进行Object Detection之后，将ROI提取出来作为每一个visual word，所有的视觉信息作为一个流，另一个流是文本信息。同时，该模型还利用了知识图谱的实体，以实体为单位进行单词的mask。

paper_names: Vibe: Video inference for human body pose and shape estimation
authors: Kocabas; Muhammed and Athanasiou; Nikos and Black; Michael J
publisher: Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
brief: VIBE模型是视频人体动捕领域的经典之作，可以很好地对RGB视频中的人体动作进行捕捉，并且进行渲染可视化。

paper_names: SMPL: A Skinned Multi-Person Linear Model
authors: Loper; Matthew  and  Mahmood; Naureen  and  Romero; Javier  and  Pons-Moll; Gerard  and  Black; Michael J.
brief: SMPL模型是目前在3D数字人体建模中用的最多最广泛的模型之一，其采用pose和shape参数对一个人的高矮胖瘦和运动进行参数化描述，在动作捕捉领域用途广泛。
